amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million to fund additional professional level VA Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment counselors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-570 to provide $10 million to fund additional professional level VA Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment counselors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Buyer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
